about.title: Our Commitment
about.description: We are dedicated to sustainable fish farming in the Finnish archipelago. Our methods respect both tradition and innovation, ensuring the highest quality products while protecting our precious marine environment.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Interested in our products? Contact us to learn more about our sustainable fish farming practices and premium products.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: We produce high-quality fish from the pristine waters of Finnish archipelago, combining traditional knowledge with modern sustainable practices.

rainbowTrout.name: Rainbow Trout
rainbowTrout.description: Rainbow trout is one of Finland's most popular food fish, known for its versatility and nutritional value.
rainbowTrout.details: Our rainbow trout is raised in carefully monitored conditions, reaching about 2.5 kg in size over two growing seasons. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids, vitamin D, and protein, it's perfect for both everyday meals and special occasions. Our fish are primarily bred from our own parent stock, ensuring consistent quality and health.

whitefish.name: Whitefish
whitefish.description: A highly valued Nordic food fish, known for its refined taste and versatility in cooking.
whitefish.details: Our whitefish is characterized by its lean, protein-rich white meat. Raised in controlled conditions to a market size of 1-1.5 kg, it's excellent for various preparations including smoking, grilling, or serving raw. We deliver it either fresh or frozen, always ensuring optimal quality.

char.name: Arctic Char
char.description: One of the northernmost salmonid species, offering a delicate flavor profile.
char.details: Our Arctic char is raised in clean, cold waters that mirror their natural habitat. The flesh varies from pink to orange, with a refined, soft, and aromatic taste. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and essential vitamins and minerals, it's perfect for smoking, frying, or grilling. We grow them to 1.5-2 kg before delivery.

caviar.name: Rainbow Trout Roe
caviar.description: A seasonal delicacy available from late autumn to early winter.
caviar.details: Our rainbow trout roe is carefully harvested and processed during the season from November to January. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and vitamin B12, it offers both excellent taste and nutritional value. Available fresh or frozen according to customer needs, with careful processing ensuring optimal flavor and texture.

contact.title: Let's Discuss Your Needs
contact.description: We'd be happy to tell you more about our products and discuss how we could work together to meet your requirements.

about.title: About M.A.T-Fish
about.subtitle: Quality Fish Products Since 1970
about.historyText: M.A.T-Fish Ab Oy has been operating in the Föglö region since the 1970s, providing premium quality fish products to our customers.
about.missionText: Our mission is to provide the highest quality fish products while maintaining sustainable farming practices.
about.visionText: To be the leading provider of premium fish products in Finland, known for quality and sustainability.

home.title: M.A.T-Fish - Premium Fish Products & Processing
home.description: Leading provider of premium quality fish products in Finland. Fresh rainbow trout, whitefish, char, and caviar from sustainable sources.

products.title: Our Products - Premium Fish & Caviar | M.A.T-Fish
products.description: Discover our range of premium fish products including rainbow trout, whitefish, char, and seasonal caviar. Fresh and sustainably farmed.

about.title: About Us - M.A.T-Fish Ab Oy
about.description: Learn about M.A.T-Fish's history, values, and commitment to sustainable fish farming and processing in Finland's archipelago.

contact.title: Contact M.A.T-Fish - Get in Touch
